archimate:DataObject.name: ResourceFacingServiceSpecAtomic
archimate:DataObject.documentation: This is an abstract base class for defining ResourceFacingServiceSpecifications that do not have any subordinate ResourceFacingServiceSpecifications. In other words; a ResourceFacingServiceSpecAtomic is a stand-alone ResourceFacingServiceSpecification; and doesnt require any supporting ResourceFacingServiceSpecifications to define the shared characteristics (i.e.; attributes; relationships; and constraints) of any ResourceFacingServices that it serves as a template for.
